title: Standard WoW discussion
content: Don’t capture the South GY unless you know exactly what you are doing. The latest Rift update added a lot of content. Mentoring, Conquest, new Instant Adventures, and Summerfest. As the Horde offensive progresses, Alliance casualties will be sent back to progressively higher levels – first E/W, then South, then the Courtyard. I was accused earlier in the week of not knowing what a gold sink is. Scanning the home system afresh this time finds a second new signature, this one resolving to be another wormhole. Most likely this means that you received a fraudulent code from a third-party seller.

title: Tonight's Dinner
